description: The FedEconomic Dev Ontario has a requirement for Sitewise-pro license., Init done for ACAN
full_summary:
### ACAN – Sitewise Pro Solution *

#### Government Acquisition Notice *

#### Contract Number: FEDDEV-2023-0305/001

#### Contract Description:

The Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario (FedDev Ontario) plans to acquire 40 licenses for a market research database to support Canadian entrepreneurs in assessing market potential. The goal of this Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) is to signal the government's intention to award a contract to Tetrad for their Sitewise Pro database.

#### Background:

FedDev Ontario requires a database that provides detailed Canadian census and consumer spending data, trends, and projections integrated with mapping software. The Sitewise Pro database, developed by Tetrad, is a data visualization and analytics solution that allows users to create analytical reports and detailed maps specific to user location and business type.

#### Requirements:

The licensed software must provide demographic data from authoritative sources, retrieve demographic profiles for standard census and postal areas, integrate demographic data and business locations, display potential customer locations on a map, and produce reports around proposed business locations. The software must also be customizable to meet the needs of the Regional Development Agency (RDA) business offices.

#### Trade Agreements:

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA).

#### Basis for Canada's Ownership of Intellectual Property:

There is no Intellectual Property being created under this contract.

#### Security Requirement:

No Security Requirement.

#### Contract Period:

The contract period is 3 years, from March 27, 2023, to March 26, 2024, with the option to add two additional 1-year periods at the discretion of FedDev Ontario.

#### Cost Estimate:

The estimated cost of the proposed contract is $206,185 for 3 years, plus GST/HST.

#### Closing Date and Time for Written Supplier Responses:

The closing date and time for written supplier responses challenging this requirement is 14:00 EST on March 21, 2023.

#### Contact Information:

For inquiries or statements of capabilities, please submit to Dianna Pietsch, Senior Procurement Officer, at procurementservices-approvisionnement@feddevontario.gc.ca, or by telephone at 519-500-5937.

Note: Please do not add or modify any
